summary: Replaces Masser with the Skaian Battlefield, and Secunda with the 4 main Lands
descriptionHtml:
Since I was so harshly beaten to the punch to make Prospit and Derse moons, I decided to kick this shizz up to eleven, and replace Masser with the Skaian Battlefield, and Secunda with LOWAS, LOFAF, LOHAC, and LOLAR.

Masser cycles between stage 3 of the Battlefield, and Prospit crashing into it.

Secunda goes between Land of Wind and Shade, Land of Light and Rain, Land of Frost and Frogs, and Land of Heat and Clockwork.

Enjoy! And to my good friend Pyleic: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J5bCBIbsrjE
(Just kidding you really inspired me to kick into gear before you did. :P)
But seriously, check his out: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2452

All images/textures in this belong to our merciful god Andrew Hussie, Daedric Prince of Heartbreak and owner of Homestuck: http://www.mspaintadventures.com/?s=6
Read, and be enlightened!
author: Farmstink
